entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Markham
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:32 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Buttonville Municipal Airport 1:00 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
Temperature: 1.6°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Humidity: 54 %
Dewpoint: -6.7°C
Wind: WNW 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
